column1: On February 16 travel by bus to Venice. From February 29 fever and cough treated at home.
On March 1 access to the pulmonary stenosis, hospitalization in medicine for pomonitis.
Chest x-ray: minimal left basal interstitial stress.
On 3 March, chest computed/computerized tomography is required for the onset of dyspnea with desaturation:
The patient is intubated and transferred to the San Martino of Genoa, in the infectious disease ward.
